title: My client start connecting after everyone
body:
From time to time,my computer doesnt want to join the loading screen during my first game. It works perfectly after but it's annoying because i keep getting remake warning. Is there anything i can do to fix this problem?             

Edit:i cant even earn loot boxes from now on and him stuck in a low priority queue :( anyone has an idea of what i could do to fix my problem and keep connecting late to the game?

replies.body: It sounds like you're having some unstable connection problems with our game servers, so you can have issues getting into a game or even transmitting what you're doing during hextech crafting.  Run through each step of our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help resolve that.  Let me know if you have any questions!
